attack_msg: [You] [verb] [them] with [your] strange tentacle protrusions, dealing [damage] damage.

Rushing in with speed [they] weren't expecting, [you] release multiple tentacles towards [them], with intent to kill.
[You] deal [damage] damage.

A sickening, sucking, dripping sound fills the room as [you] attempt to [verb] [them] with their... tentacles?
[You] deal [damage] damage.

The silence is unnerving. Tentacles extend off [you], bearing down on [them].
[You] deal [damage] damage.
